Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '470'. Name Theaidetos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR P.15978.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (206)
